title: Fortescue Expands Into Copper by Buying Peru-Focused Explorer
description: Fortescue Ltd. has agreed to acquire Canada-based explorer Alta Copper Corp. in a deal that marks the Australian company’s first major foray beyond iron ore into other metals.
content: Fortescue Ltd. has agreed to acquire Canada-based explorer Alta Copper Corp. in a deal that marks the Australian company’s first major foray beyond iron ore into other metals.
